info.name: Facetube add-on (clean facebook adfree)
info.description:
First install the great Facetube style, you can find it here: http://userstyles.org/styles/75674/facetube all credits go to jennedebleser.
This add-on style makes it all even more clean and less crowded.

Enjoy the serene facebook experience ;-)
info.additionalInfo: Updated profile pages due to latest facebook changes.
